articles.title: Top European court backs woman whose husband got a divorce because she stopped having sex with him - CBS News
articles.description: "I hope that this decision will mark a turning point in the fight for women's rights in France," the woman said.
articles.content:
Europe's top rights court on Thursday ruled in favor of a 69-year-old French woman whose husband obtained a divorce on the grounds that she stopped having sex with him.
The European Court of Human R… [+4718 chars]
